Why Custom Functions?

Your functions run inside the sandboxed WASM engine - safe, isolated, and persistent. They are saved to localStorage and reloaded automatically.

Why WASM for a Calculator?

This calculator runs MicroQuickJS compiled to WebAssembly. Your code executes in a completely isolated sandbox - it cannot access the DOM, cookies, network, or any browser APIs.

Security Benefits

  • Code runs in isolated WASM memory space
  • No access to document, window, or fetch
  • Safe to run untrusted calculations
  • No browser code execution security risks

Unique Features

  • Persistent engine state across calculations
  • Define variables that survive between runs
  • Create custom functions stored in localStorage
  • Full JavaScript syntax (ES5+) support
  • Only 168KB WASM binary
